title: ‘His Signing Raises the Level of Everyone’: How Primož Roglič Is Transforming Bora-Hansgrohe
content:
Despite slow Paris-Nice start, Slovenian rider’s transfer in pursuit of Tour de France glory is raising German team’s game: 'We absolutely buy into it.'

Read the full article at ‘His Signing Raises the Level of Everyone’: How Primož Roglič Is Transforming Bora-Hansgrohe on Velo.
author: sstokes
